traits.desc:

traits.desc: Every @Cadence@ seconds gain Ability Power equal to your Mana Regen.

traits.desc: After two takedowns, stun enemies within 2 hexes for @StunDuration@ seconds and gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp for the rest of combat.

traits.desc: Arrows cost @ManaReduction@ less Mana during Varus's Ability.

traits.desc:

traits.desc: Attacks have a @PercentageChanceToTrigger@% chance to <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> the target for @StunDuration@ second.

traits.desc: Gain @CritChance*100@% Critical Strike Chance. Attacks that critically strike deal @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_SpiritSword.1:BonusMagicDamage@% bonus magic damage.

traits.desc: Every @ICD@ seconds, Burn and Wound the closest non-Burning enemy for @Duration@ seconds. Take @DamageReduction*100@% less damage from Burning enemies.

traits.desc: Gain @BonusHealth@ Health and grant an additional +@BonusTraitAmount@ to the selected Stance's trait.

traits.desc: Every @HealTickRate@ seconds heal this champion and allies within 2-hexes for @MissingHealthHeal*100@% of their missing Health.

traits.desc:

Prismatic: Earn 1 point for every Completed item a champions uses in combat. Graduate at @PrismaticItemRequirement@ points. (@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT15_BattleAcademia_PrismaticNumItems@/@PrismaticItemRequirement@).

traits.desc:

(@TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_Rogue.2:MinUnits@) Both champions jump.

(@MinUnits@) @AD@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAS% | @Health@ %i:scaleHealth%, @Resists@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%

traits.desc: On cast, the @NumAllies@ nearest allies gain @TFTTrait.TFT15_MechanicTrait_EssenceShare.1:ManaPct*100@% of Mana spent.

traits.desc: Attacks and Abilities ignore @PercentIgnore@% of enemy's Armor.

traits.desc: Every 4th attack deals @IncreasedDamage*100@% more damage. Overkill damage bounces to the nearest enemy.

traits.desc:

(@MinUnits@) @ADBonus*100@% %i:scaleAD%; @HealRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth% heal

traits.desc: Gain @Health*100@% Health and @AP@% Ability Power for every 1-cost fielded, doubled if they're 3-star.

traits.desc: Start combat at @HealthPercent*100@% Health, but gain @DA*100@% Damage Amp.

traits.desc: Shen's ability also shields the lowest health ally for @ShieldPercent*100@% of his shield and gains @MagicResist@ stacking Magic Resist on cast.

traits.desc: After every @NumAttacks@th attack, fire five projectiles at the closest enemies that deal @PercentBADDamage@% of Basic Attack Damage as physical damage.
